MAN.TITLE: set
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: set a property value of a User Interface object.

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: h : integer the handle of the object which to set a property up
prop : character string name of the property
val : scilab object value to give to the property

DESCRIPTION.P: This routine can be used to set a GUI object specified property. Property name are character strings like 'style', 'position' .... The type of the value field depends on the property one aims at setting. For example, the 'style' property which represents the kind of Object the UI control is (ie button, label, list, ..... ) will be represented as a string. On the contrary, the 'position' property, which represents the geometrical aspect of the UI control, will be coded as a [1,4] vector.
